Posts.Content: Kim, I to have idc age 45.  I often can't sleep, (I think its the tamoxifen) but I am glad I can pray for you.  When fear wants to grip me and I have turned to The Word...you have my attention, God, what are you saying to me?   Usually he is asking for the load back, because he never looses. I can't believe all the mini miracles I have been blessed with these past few months...sometimes I have to try and remember some of them and slowly just a bit more peace comes.  Sending you a hug! Shari
Posts.Title: Cant shake the worry!

Posts.Content: Has anyone else had to wait for the filling process to start radiation?  I'm stage 3 bc and getting nervous about the wait.  I've had 4 rounds chemo and then a double mast. w/reconstruction, 3 possitive lymph nodes in Sept.  Also has anyone had a good or bad outcome with radiation on expanders then the replacement surgery later?  Family wants me to forgo the fill and get radation now.  The radiologist mentioned we have up to 7 mos.  Thanks for any advice...Shari age 45
Posts.Title: Needing advice...Radiation after double mast w/expanders
